replies.body: I know no one will see this. But I love each and every one of you. Have a wonderful and joyous life.
I love you too dude. No homo{{champion:44}}
ALL THE HOMO {{champion:81}}
Seen, noticed, approved. Thank you and have a wonderful life yourself, kind Sir.
{{item:2044}} FIX ITEM SETS!!! EVERYTIME AN UPDATE COMES OUT THEY ARE DELETED! PLEASE FIX I AM TIRED OF REDOING THEM! **PLEASE GET THIS MESSAGE TO THE TOP!**{{item:2044}}
Mine are perfectly fine, I even have item sets that I made a long time ago that I had forgotten about.
And the last assassin silence falls {{item:3070}} {{champion:91}} {{item:3070}}
{{champion:90}} is listed as an assasin.
Shhhhhhh, no one needs to see that...protect the silence
Why has Garen been getting all of these buffs?
FOR DEMACIA!
{{champion:150}} DEMALGIO!
There really is no other correct answer here....
Well except Karthus but that goes without saying.

Patch Notes Update for **CLARITY**

{{champion:91}} has been removed from the game.
I think he's just stealthed.

Let all us Talon mains have a moment of silence... 'Cus he won't be having them any longer...

Just saying though, it was difficult if not impossible to finish his combo before the silence ended.

Just rename Talon's Cutthroat to Hamstring. It's short and accurate.

Explanation: to Hamstring a person is to cut or injure the hamstring (the tendon in the leg that controls bending at the knee) in such a way that they fall or cannot walk. Its goal is to disable movement. Also, you would be behind the target for this maneuver.

Makes sense to me.
R.I.P {{champion:76}}
RIP {{champion:57}}
RIP {{champion:91}}

RIP?!?!?!
Dont you see the buff?
now his W and E grants his passive
His passive has always been shit.
Get cancer moron.
wanna fight idiot
Children, children. You're both just awful.
Things escalated a little too quickly O.o
Now, I didn't love {{champion:91}} (Anivia main ftw!), but even I have to admit that nerf is kind of ridiculous
They should at least make it interrupt channels and/or increase the slow time to 1 full second. Or even possibly make it a 1 second stun/snare.
{{champion:14}}  GIVE US THE NEW SION!!! {{champion:14}}
{{champion:14}} is love. {{champion:14}} is life.
{{champion:14}} is outdated.
We can rebuild him. We have the technology.
Not for long
He still needs to go to the PBE, he will probably be there as soon as they are done with his micro event,

welp. im 90% sure {{champion:91}} is dead. they should have just removed him or at least changed the silence to a snare or something with counter play (zhonya/QSS) instead of a shitty fraction of a second slow.

So mad about the Talon nerf. He's pretty much unplayable now. Oh wow, a slow, like he doesn't already have one. Also, his passive is pretty useless. If you get a crit with IE on a slowed enemy, you'll be doing 825 (750+75). So basically, remove silence for 75 damage on a basic attack. Yeah, that's pretty terrible

RIP {{champion:91}} 

LONG LIVE {{champion:86}}
They are doing it... removing the silences... This time they took out {{champion:112}} and {{champion:91}}'s. Next thing we know {{champion:31}}, {{champion:9}}, {{champion:86}}, or {{champion:90}}.

every other silence isn't a big deal {{champion:90}}  u just walk out of the hit area {{champion:31}}  and {{champion:86}}  aren't burst so again not a big deal {{champion:9}}  also falls under this category
I'm just waiting for them to fully remove the mechanic of a silence. It honestly feels like they don't want to "shock" us and remove them all at once. So they take them away one by one.
They just gave Soraka an AOE silence though
Don't come in here with your *logic* and your "facts".   We're here to complain, and complain we shall!
RIP {{champion:91}} .. He will forever be missed. {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
{{champion:91}} 99%, 1 second slow? That's just silly, I think a snare would work better.
It's a 0.25 second slow.  Trust me, you can't notice at all
Well, there goes the last mid-lane silence. Rest in Piece {{champion:38}} ,{{champion:7}} , and {{champion:91}}
next wil be malz to follow with the purple color scheme

While I won't comment on the appropriateness of the change itself, in what universe is swapping a 1s slience for a .25s slow a "small tap"? That's about as reasonable a description of what's going on as "clean coal".

Assuming the the change to Talon's E isn't immediately reverted (I don't even play - or like - Talon and I think he's better off with the silence), a good new name for the ability could be "Hamstring".
